title: 데이터 현황
text:
list(
  icon = "file-person-fill",
  color = "danger",
  value = paste0(nrow(PID$PID_ONLY),"명")
)

$icon
[1] "file-person-fill"

$color
[1] "danger"

$value
[1] "3345215명"



list(
  icon = "bar-chart",
  color = "secondary",
  value = paste0(sum(PID$TABLE_N_YEAR$N),"건")
)

$icon
[1] "bar-chart"

$color
[1] "secondary"

$value
[1] "7774704건"






전체연령성별



f_header <- function(value){
  units <- div(style = "color: #737373", "year")
  div(title = value, value, units)
                          }

PID$TABLE_N_YEAR %>% select(SALUS_YEAR, N, `(%)`) %>%
  reactable(
    columns = list(
      SALUS_YEAR = colDef(name = "YEAR", style = f_style_bold, align="center", html=TRUE,
                          header = f_header),
      N = colDef(name = "N", format = colFormat(separators = TRUE)),
      `(%)` = colDef(name = "(%)" ,format = colFormat(suffix = "%"), align="left")
      ),
    defaultColDef = colDef(align = "right"),
    striped = TRUE,
    highlight = TRUE
  )








PID$TABLE_N_YEAR %>% select(SALUS_YEAR, N, contains("AGE")) %>%
  reactable()








PID$TABLE_N_YEAR %>% select(SALUS_YEAR, N, starts_with("SEX_M"),starts_with("SEX_F")) %>%
  mutate(`SEX_M_%` = `SEX_M_%`*100, `SEX_F_%` = `SEX_F_%`*100) %>% 
  unite("비율", c(`SEX_M_%`,`SEX_F_%`), sep = ":") %>% select(SALUS_YEAR, N, SEX_M, SEX_F, 비율) %>%
  reactable(
    columns = list(
      SALUS_YEAR = colDef(name = "YEAR", style = f_style_bold, align="center"),
      N = colDef(name = "N (Total)", format = colFormat(separators = TRUE)),
      SEX_M   = colDef(name = "N (Male)", format = colFormat(separators = TRUE)),
      SEX_F   = colDef(name = "N (Female)" , format = colFormat(separators = TRUE)),
      비율    = colDef(name = "Proportion (M:F)", format = colFormat(prefix = "(", suffix = ")"))
      ),
    defaultColDef = colDef(align = "right"),
    striped = TRUE,
    highlight = TRUE)












df <- PID$TABLE_N_YEAR %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = c(SEX_M, SEX_F), names_to = "SEX", values_to = "COUNT")

# Create the stacked bar chart
ggplot(df, aes(x = SALUS_YEAR, y = COUNT, fill = SEX)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  scale_y_continuous() + #labels = comma_format(scale = 1e-3, suffix = "K")
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("SEX_M" = "#4E79A7", "SEX_F" = "#E15759")) +
  labs(title = "Distribution of N by Year and Sex",
       x = "Year",
       y = "Count (Thousands)",
       fill = "Sex") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(
    plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5, face = "bold"),
    axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1),
    legend.position = "bottom"
  )












reactable::reactable(PID$TABLE_N_CENTER)

title: 데이터 현황
text:
전체연령성별



f_header <- function(value){
  units <- div(style = "color: #737373", "year")
  div(title = value, value, units)
                          }

PID$TABLE_N_YEAR %>% select(SALUS_YEAR, N, `(%)`) %>%
  reactable(
    columns = list(
      SALUS_YEAR = colDef(name = "YEAR", style = f_style_bold, align="center", html=TRUE,
                          header = f_header),
      N = colDef(name = "N", format = colFormat(separators = TRUE)),
      `(%)` = colDef(name = "(%)" ,format = colFormat(suffix = "%"), align="left")
      ),
    defaultColDef = colDef(align = "right"),
    striped = TRUE,
    highlight = TRUE
  )








PID$TABLE_N_YEAR %>% select(SALUS_YEAR, N, contains("AGE")) %>%
  reactable()








PID$TABLE_N_YEAR %>% select(SALUS_YEAR, N, starts_with("SEX_M"),starts_with("SEX_F")) %>%
  mutate(`SEX_M_%` = `SEX_M_%`*100, `SEX_F_%` = `SEX_F_%`*100) %>% 
  unite("비율", c(`SEX_M_%`,`SEX_F_%`), sep = ":") %>% select(SALUS_YEAR, N, SEX_M, SEX_F, 비율) %>%
  reactable(
    columns = list(
      SALUS_YEAR = colDef(name = "YEAR", style = f_style_bold, align="center"),
      N = colDef(name = "N (Total)", format = colFormat(separators = TRUE)),
      SEX_M   = colDef(name = "N (Male)", format = colFormat(separators = TRUE)),
      SEX_F   = colDef(name = "N (Female)" , format = colFormat(separators = TRUE)),
      비율    = colDef(name = "Proportion (M:F)", format = colFormat(prefix = "(", suffix = ")"))
      ),
    defaultColDef = colDef(align = "right"),
    striped = TRUE,
    highlight = TRUE)

title: 데이터 현황
text:
df <- PID$TABLE_N_YEAR %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = c(SEX_M, SEX_F), names_to = "SEX", values_to = "COUNT")

# Create the stacked bar chart
ggplot(df, aes(x = SALUS_YEAR, y = COUNT, fill = SEX)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  scale_y_continuous() + #labels = comma_format(scale = 1e-3, suffix = "K")
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("SEX_M" = "#4E79A7", "SEX_F" = "#E15759")) +
  labs(title = "Distribution of N by Year and Sex",
       x = "Year",
       y = "Count (Thousands)",
       fill = "Sex") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(
    plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5, face = "bold"),
    axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1),
    legend.position = "bottom"
  )
